name: Marked Man
description:
Overview

You play as a prize fighting mercenary, tasked with collecting the bounty on a galactic criminal known only as "Nemain". Fortified on an old mining company space station, you must take out his followers stationed around each room and make your way to the room "Nemain" is held up in. With the help of special abilities, you can choose to fight "Nemain" when you have progressed your ability build. Will you be able to take the fight to the Marked Man?

The special abilities system contains multiple abilities classified by their type (Movement, projectile, weapon upgrade and melee) and projectile based abilities are sub-classified by  their element (Pyro, lighting, cryo, toxic and void). At the end of each wave an emissive cube will spawn near the exit, when the player collides with the cube, they will be presented with an ability choice interface where the player will be able to choose from 3 options for a new ability or an upgrade for an existing one, the choices are randomized every time.
